data.what_is:
Inboundio is the world's simplest digital marketing platform targeted towards individuals and small / medium businesses looking to organize their Internet Marketing efforts as well as Agencies or franchises looking to offer an easy to use white label / reseller service to their clients/franchisees.

For end users Inboundio provides an easy way to accomplish basic online marketing activities (Social Media Posting, Landing Pages, Lead Generation, Basic CRM, Email & Drip Marketing) without being over complicated, or overpriced.   Check out Inboundio at https://www.inboundio.com/ for video demo's, a complete list of features and pricing.

As a reseller / white label subscriber you can brand inboundio as your own, create your own plans and pricing and start earning recurring revenue.  In addition to recurring revenue Inboundio is a great tool to allow your agency to upsell associated services like graphic design of email templates, landing pages and even full social media management.  

You can hand off control by letting the customer manage themselves or you can take complete control of their entire marketing all from one easy to use dashboard.

Find out more on Inboundio for Resellers at https://www.inboundio.com/Resellers
data.product_description: World's Most Powerful Inbound Marketing SoftwareinBoundio PRO is the only white label marketing software on the web. When software like HubSpot, InfusionSoft, Marketo, Act-on, Pardot etc are SaaS software, inBoundio PRO will be on your own domain with your name. This way, you will be building your own business with your clients and creating business assets.
data.positioning_against_competitor: Product DescriptionWorld's Most Powerful Inbound Marketing SoftwareinBoundio PRO is the only white label marketing software on the web. When software like HubSpot, InfusionSoft, Marketo, Act-on, Pardot etc are SaaS software, inBoundio PRO will be on your own domain with your name. This way, you will be building your own business with your clients and creating business assets.Seller DetailsSellerInboundioTwitter@inboundio614 Twitter followersLinkedIn(r) Pagewww.linkedin.comMEOverview Provided by:Marcus EddyDirector, C9 - Web, Integration & Software

pricing_plans.plan_description: The single user version of Inboundio perfect for small business to get started.

Want to do some serious sending on a monthly basis?

Jump on PREMIUM & get more users and DOUBLE your STANDARD Email quota

Need multi-user or more emails?

STANDARD our Most popular plan gives you over TRIPLE the email quota of LITE for a small jump in price.

Inboundio RESELLER / WHITE LABEL is perfect for design agencies, marketing agencies,& franchise companies.

It is a great tool for companies to create additional recurring revenue streams within their business.

In addition to recurring revenue Inboundio is a great tool to allow your agency to upsell associated services like graphic design of email templates, landing pages and even full social media management.

You can hand off control by letting the customer manage themselves or you can take complete control of their entire marketing all from one easy to use dashboard.

What's best is you decide what to charge your customers with your own plans, pricing and account limits giving you the complete flexibility on what to offer.
plan_features: Use your own branding (design, logo, domain etc)
Create your own plans and pricing
Pay-per-client pricing model for complete flexibility
Upgrade or downgrade your clients at any time
Centralised email & landing page template management

initial_reviews.review_title: SCAM!! Pay with a credit card so you can dispute charges
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inboundio?
Nothing really, which is why we were able to dispute 5 months worth of charges and got every cent back.

What do you dislike about Inboundio?
The sales process was great. We had several meetings with our sales rep and after hearing what we were looking for he sent us this value stack:

DFY - as busy as you want to be.
Value stack:

Webchat only for Inbound Lead Flow - $100
Local SEO for inbound Lead Flow- $600
Sales management + Custom Dashboard- $500
Custom Pipelines- $195
Unlimited Email + SMS Campaigns- $500
Pipeline Reactivation- $440
Phone Calls(Pre-recorded) and VoiceDrops - $300
Reporting Tracking Pages - $50
New Website +Unlimited Sales Pages/Funnels- $750
Follow Up + Nurture Scripts - $250
Direct Access to Account Managers and Assigned Strategist- $1550
Reputation Management - $500
Social Media Management Capable - $250
Invoicing - $100
Hosting - $150/yr
CRM  - $100/mo
Appointment Setting -$1997/mo
Facebook ad management monthly - typically $2500/mo
Total Value- $10782 monthly

Our Price -$2750/ month (NO Contract) (includes everything listed above)
Ad spend- as busy as you want to be. (most common among clients is to start at $2000- $3000/mo and scale from there.)

Of course this sounded so great but Needless to say we got almost nothing after 5-months.

We were given a dedicated account rep with their dedicated phone number.... although the number was disconnected and they always said they were going to look into it.

We got our CRM set up right away and we got the META ads right away but that's it. We started using the CRM by adding our own leads in right away. During month three we asked why we hadn't received any leads and they tried to take credit for all the leads we had added in the CRM ourselves.

Everytime we asked about the any of the items on the pitch deck they said we were going to start setting up during our next meeting- Always during our next meeting.

We were more than patient, until one day we found out they were running and charging us for ads with another company's logo and contact information.

After finding this, we called inboundio and confronted them about it. A day later they sent us an email containing an apology email, and a new ad proof. We responded by asking for an explanation on how that happened and how we could ensure it would not happen again. They responded but resending the the same apology (copy-paste).

We set up a meeting with inbound and asked they for a list of all the outsourced services and asked them how to extract the all the information we had input ourselves. The lady helping us seemed like this was pretty routine for her. Maybe that's why they recently rebranded.

After learning about the outsourced services we realized it was much cheaper and more efficient for us to outsource ourselves and use Chat GPT to generate the Ads for Meta.

As mentioned above, we disputed the charges with our credit card company. The credit card company asked us for proof and after reviewing the emails we sent them, and the ads with another company's logo on it, they concluded that we we're entitled to all of our money back.

This company is a SCAM. Don't fall for it.

What problems is Inboundio solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for advertising services. The fell very short of that.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Inboundio?
review_question_answers.answer: Nothing really, which is why we were able to dispute 5 months worth of charges and got every cent back.

initial_reviews.review_title: Useful, but pretty basic considering the alternatives
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inboundio?
Inboundio seems to be a good platform, and it serves its purpose well. It allows the quick creation of landing pages through a graphic user interface and the way its built allows for a degree of customization that appears to be good.

What do you dislike about Inboundio?
Even though its useful, the interface is way too basic, and the landing pages you can build with it are too, so they may not really help you a lot at the end of the day. The resulting landing pages don't appear to have the same quality as other tools on the market and that shows, especially when comparing to our website. The same can be said about the email marketing platform. But at the end of the day, what matters is that it just works.

What problems is Inboundio solving and how is that benefiting you?
Creating landing pages for marketing campaigns and creating email marketing campaigns to support sales.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Inboundio?
review_question_answers.answer: Inboundio seems to be a good platform, and it serves its purpose well. It allows the quick creation of landing pages through a graphic user interface and the way its built allows for a degree of customization that appears to be good.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Inboundio?
review_question_answers.answer: Even though its useful, the interface is way too basic, and the landing pages you can build with it are too, so they may not really help you a lot at the end of the day. The resulting landing pages don't appear to have the same quality as other tools on the market and that shows, especially when comparing to our website. The same can be said about the email marketing platform. But at the end of the day, what matters is that it just works.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Inboundio solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Creating landing pages for marketing campaigns and creating email marketing campaigns to support sales.
